narrative.narrative: Air Tajik, is the flag carrier of Tajikistan, based out of Dushanbe. They have been in operation since 1923 and operate a fleet of 12 aircraft. They serve 19 destinations, 4 of them in Tajistan, and fly to 9 countries outside of their home country including 8 Russian cities. Their fleet is varied and inludes 737's,757's and several Russian made aircraft from Antonov,Tupolev,and Yakolev. They have also ordered 2 Sukoi Superjet 100's.
